note: Make it a Triple is all about making games with a whole lot of heart, a brain, and an open door. We're dedicated to crafting experiences that are not only fun but challenge conventional thinking. At Triple, we thrive on creating games that are bold mashups, tell soulful stories, or reimagine beloved classics in fresh and exciting ways. Most importantly, we believe everyone should be able to play, so accessibility and smooth functionality are at the core of everything we do.
